Summary: looked like a bright star or planet.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Post Falls
There were no other sightings in Post Falls on or around May 8th 2008
divs: Sighting Details Looked like a Bright star setting beneath another bright star due easr, looking up at about a 45 degree angle. standing on my porch having a cig, I thought i saw it start to move and after 10 secs or so, I knew it was moving north very slow, but pick up a little pace for about 15 secs then stopped totally looking like a star again. watched it another 10 mins.till it faded out of sight. I felt no threat, in fact, rather peaceful about it.
